title: This Week's Top Stories - Joe Biden's "Scandals" & Vaccine Buddy System in Massachusetts
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Joe Biden's "Scandals" & Vaccine Buddy System in Massachusetts
description:
Right-wing pundits lash out at President Biden, Tom Brady wins his seventh Super Bowl, Massachusetts grants vaccines to people who show up with someone age 75 or older and more.
